Is there any mod that adds aerial base? so that we could save exit and come back from balloon, and mission like this one? I have an old computer, so I'm against increasing physic range with lazor beam and attach stuff to the ground.

If not already, could we use the behaviour of lanching clamps?

Note that while no part touches the ground, the vessel is considered Landed (KER hud, at the right of the altimeter)

If you mean airship balloons mod, there are:

Procedural Airships

(http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library , "Earth/Wind/Fire and Water")

Great thanx! very nice links!

I may have misformulate my idea :I want to save and exit craft (may they be balloons) in flight within an atmosphere, and at an higher altitude than 2.2km (lower, I can use KAS).

You want some way to 'land' crafts on a platform in the sky?

Sounds pritty cool
